long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance the Rally Sim Fans website by displaying medal icons next to your personal record times. Can you get all golds?

When you visit your user stats page of the Rally Sim Fans website, medal icons will appear next to your personal record times that qualify for a medal. To see the target times, move your mouse over the personal record time. There are also statistics added to the profile table at the top.

How to Use
1. Install the extension
2. Visit the Rally Sim Fans website and login to your account
3. Navigate to the user stats page
4. Click the "Show record times" button
